# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.getMinimumNextBid() method

Get the minimum next bid for an english auction

## Example

```javascript
// The ID of the auction you want to get the minimum next bid for
const auctionId = "0";
const minimumNextBid = await contract.englishAuctions.getMinimumNextBid(
  auctionId,
);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMinimumNextBid(auctionId: BigNumberish): Promise<CurrencyValue>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description       |
| --------- | ------------ | ----------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | id of the auction |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;CurrencyValue&gt;

the minimum bid a user can place to outbid the previous highest bid
